metadata.title: CVE-2022-1587 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was discovered in the PCRE2 library inthe get_recurse_data_length() function of the pcre2_jit_compile.c file.This issue affects recursions in JIT-compiled regular expressions caused byduplicate data transfers.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1587` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpcre2-16-0 - 10.34-7ubuntu0.1
libpcre2-32-0 - 10.34-7ubuntu0.1
libpcre2-8-0 - 10.34-7ubuntu0.1
libpcre2-posix2 - 10.34-7ubuntu0.1
pcre2-utils - 10.34-7ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pcre2 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.34-7ubuntu0.1').
